content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) 
-  Chest (position x=-14.5, y=-47.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=-14.5, y=-46.5) that puts items into the chest

### Furnace at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of 
-  Furnace (position x=0.0, y=0.0) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when drill is out of fuel
-  Make sure to refuel the drill before attempting to mine
### Errors when drill output is blocked by item on the ground
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output before mining
### Errors when inserter is out of fuel
-  Make sure to refuel the inserter before attempting to insert items
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure there are ingredients in the furnace before attempting to smelt
### Errors when research times out
-  Ensure that the research is properly set up and that the agent has the necessary resources to complete the research

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* Drill position: (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
* Inserter position: (x=-14.5, y=-46.5)
* Chest position: (x=-14.5, y=-47.5)
* Furnace position: (x=0.0, y=0.0)
